0.user_question: Sandy walked from Holloway Shores to Sun Valley Shores for 8 hours on a particular day. She also walked half as many hours on the second day as she walked on the first day, to Hollock valley shores. Calculate the total time Sandy took to walk in the two days in minutes.

direct_answer.text: First let's find out how long Sandy walked on the second day. Half the duration of walking on the first day would mean sandy walked (8/2) = <<8/2=4>>4 hours on the second day. Therefore combined both durations together which was ((4+8)*60)=<<(4+8)*60=720>>720 minutes altogether..
